welcome_message_body: Welcome to West Covina! Known for its small-town charm and vibrant community, we invite you to explore our beautiful city and enjoy all it has to offer. Whether it's our local shops, delicious dining options, or our stunning parks, we hope you have a wonderful time here.

restaurants.name: El Pescador
restaurants.description: El Pescador is a mexican restaurant located in West Covina.
restaurants.address: 1125 W West Covina Pkwy (at Fashion Plaza Way), West Covina, CA 91790

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cable Airport provides services for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chino Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Chino Airport is reserved for private and charter flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized travel experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for major airlines such as Delta and United.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for smaller airlines such as JetBlue and Southwest.

terminals.name: Tom Bradley International Terminal
terminals.description: The largest and newest terminal at LAX, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at LAX, serving domestic flights for Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 6
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a one-time registration and may have limited speed and data usage.
